html: (2 Nephi 27:25)."Precepts of men." These are principles of conduct espoused by men but devoid of the Spirit. Such precepts are not based on the "living water" of gospel truths but rather leave men either thirsting or spiritually poisoned from their ill effects. (John 4:10-14.) Precepts of men are false doctrines that cause men to err, to fail to recognize the truth, and to deny the power of God. (2 Nephi 28:14-15, 26; D&C 45:28-29; JS-H 1:19; DCE, 433-34.)
